channel.title: NPC drop
channel.description:
well i have this NPC that drops primal and promethium and when i kill it, it drops nothing. when i spawn it using ::npc, it actually drops. anybody can help me? this is what it shows when i kill it when it's spawned automatically
[11/19/12 9:57 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.handleDungeoneeringDrops (NPCHandler.java:3048) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 2764) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at server.GameEngine.run(GameEngine.java:24) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at server.Server$1.execute(Server.java:160) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at server.task.Task.tick(Task.java:107) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at server.task.TaskScheduler.run(TaskScheduler.java:125) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(E xecutors.java:471) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset (FutureTask.java:351) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(FutureTas k.java:178) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$Sche duledFutureTask.access$301(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:178) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$Sche duledFutureTask.run(ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.java:293) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Thr eadPoolExecutor.java:1110) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Th readPoolExecutor.java:603) [11/19/12 9:57 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)

your dungeoneeringdrops is fucking up your regular drops somehow…
